cookie.title: Your Privacy Matters
cookie.message: We use cookies to personalize content and ads, provide social media features, and analyze our traffic. You can choose to accept all cookies or manage your preferences.

q1.title: Is it free?
q1.body: Yes! FocusField+ is free during the launch period. We will consider premium plans in the future, but the basic version will always be accessible.

q2.title: Do I need to create an account?
q2.body: No, you can start right away. If you want to save your preferences, you can create a profile.

q3.title: How does the spiritual mode work?
q3.body: It is designed to help you focus while maintaining a respectful connection with God, through music, guided silences, and uplifting content.

q4.title: Can I use it on mobile?
q4.body: Yes! FocusField+ is optimized for mobile, and soon a dedicated app will be available.
